title.value: A community effort in SARS-CoV-2 drug discovery
title.justification: The main title of the paper is focused on the community's effort to discover drugs against SARS-CoV-2, which is explicitly mentioned in the paper.
title.quote: A community effort in SARS-CoV-2 drug discovery

extractions.description: The paper reports on an open science community effort named the "Billion molecules against COVID-19 challenge". It was organized to identify small-molecule inhibitors against SARS-CoV-2 and relevant human receptors. The paper discusses the computational approaches used to screen a billion virtual molecules, collaborate with contract research organizations for synthesis and testing, and identify compounds showing biological activity against certain protein targets.

type.justification: The paper details experimental procedures, results from computational screenings, synthesis, and biological testing, indicating empirical research.
type.quote: In this work, we report the results of an open science community effort... Participating teams used a wide variety of computational methods to screen a minimum of 1 billion virtual molecules... coordinated with various contract research organizations... to test 878 compounds for biological activity.

name.justification: The research focuses primarily on discovering new drug candidates against SARS-CoV-2 using computational and experimental methods, making Drug Discovery its primary field.
name.quote: Open science approaches such as the one presented here contribute to the knowledge base of future drug discovery efforts in finding better SARS-CoV-2 treatments.

name.justification: The paper describes the use of diverse machine learning methods for virtual screening of compounds, making it a significant sub-field.
name.quote: The computational teams used a variety of machine learning... deep learning methods – e. g., self-normalizing-networks, LSTMs, CNNs, geometric deep learning, and graph neural networks.

name.justification: The study involves virtual screening and molecular modeling, which are core aspects of Computational Chemistry.
name.quote: The teams used docking and hybrid approaches... also considered molecular dynamics simulations.

name.justification: The paper mentions the use of self-normalizing networks as one of the deep learning methods applied in the research.
name.quote: deep learning methods – e. g., self-normalizing-networks

is_contributed.justification: The self-normalizing networks are not described as a novel contribution in the paper.
is_contributed.quote: deep learning methods – e. g., self-normalizing-networks

is_executed.justification: The methods, including self-normalizing networks, were used as part of the computational screening process.
is_executed.quote: The computational teams used a variety of machine learning methods... and deep learning methods – e. g., self-normalizing-networks.

is_compared.justification: The paper discusses the results of different computational methods, including deep learning approaches, which implies a comparison.
is_compared.quote: Overview of computational methods used by the different teams.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced paper likely provides foundational knowledge on self-normalizing networks used in this study.
referenced_paper_title.quote: G. Klambauer, T. Unterthiner, A. Mayr, S. Hochreiter, in Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems, Vol. 30.

name.justification: The use of LSTM networks is explicitly mentioned as a part of the machine learning approaches in the paper.
name.quote: deep learning methods – e. g., self-normalizing-networks, LSTMs, CNNs

is_contributed.justification: LSTMs are established models and are not specifically contributed by this paper.
is_contributed.quote: deep learning methods – e. g., self-normalizing-networks, LSTMs, CNNs

is_executed.justification: LSTMs were among the models executed for virtual molecular screenings in the paper.
is_executed.quote: deep learning methods – e. g., self-normalizing-networks, LSTMs, CNNs

is_compared.justification: The comparison of various deep learning methods, including LSTMs, is implicit in the overview of computational methodologies.
is_compared.quote: Overview of computational methods used by the different teams.

referenced_paper_title.justification: LSTMs are a well-documented framework referenced for its application in the study.
referenced_paper_title.quote: S. Hochreiter, J. Schmidhuber, Neural Comput. 1997.

name.quote: deep learning methods – e. g., self-normalizing-networks, LSTMs, CNNs, geometric deep learning, and graph neural networks.

name.justification: Zinc 15 is mentioned as one of the recommended databases for virtual screening by the computational teams.
name.quote: In terms of screening databases, Zinc 15, CAS (anti-virals), and SweetLead were suggested.

name.justification: AutoDock Vina is named as one of the docking tools used by various computational teams in the research.
name.quote: The docking teams used different tools like GLIDE, AutoDock Vina, QVINA2, VirtualFlow, Fred, Smina, Gold, PLANTS, and Data Warrior.
